execution_plan.description: For each user in the chat database, get their id, username, and the number of distinct chats they participate in (including users with zero chats).
execution_plan.query: SELECT users.id AS s1__id, users.username AS s1__username, COUNT(DISTINCT chat_members.chat_id) AS s1__chat_count FROM users LEFT JOIN chat_members ON users.id = chat_members.user_id GROUP BY users.id, users.username;
